function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inequality in housing conditions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unresolved past problems related to housing quality","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of clear national legislation on hygienic requirements for housing","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited role of public health officers in design and construction choices","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependency on the competence of designers and responsibility of builders for health in design solutions","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of interdisciplinary approach between technical and health backgrounds","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of awareness among stakeholders of factors affecting health in living spaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Little shared vocabulary among disciplines","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Conflicting building and hygiene regulations","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Profound housing crisis highlighted by covid-19 pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Labour shortages due to lockdown, furlough scheme, and workforce infections","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Severe impact on cashflow, funding, and project costs","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for increased disputes due to force majeure provisions in contracts","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contractual issues such as late payments, material breach of contract, repudiation, delay damages, risk allocation","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unprecedented economic recession triggered by the coronavirus crisis","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decreased productivity and output in the uk construction industry","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmissivity of covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact on mental health of workers","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Late public health response by the uk government","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low productivity and job losses due to public health measures","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decreased output of construction industry due to withdrawal of government intervention","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Labour shortages in the construction industry due to covid-19","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate communication and training on covid-19 interventions for businesses","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Disputes between employers and contractors due to lack of timely notices","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 within construction sites and facilities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global spread of coronavirus disease 2019 covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Facile transmission of sars-cov-2 via the air","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in determining the distribution and magnitude of infected populations","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of early warning system for pandemics","category":"Infrastructural risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in scaling conventional testing for risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limited testing capacity and throughput due to current diagnostic methods","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient targeting of higher-risk sub-populations for testing","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Privacy, ethics, and legal concerns limiting the application of wbe","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for undetected outbreaks in confined subpopulations like schools, hospitals, and warehouses.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limitations of manufacturing and supply chains for diagnostic testing","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of data-driven strategy for reopening and closing economies during resurgence of outbreaks.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Early re-opening of businesses and termination of population isolation could lead to a covid-19 rebound or seasonal re-emergence.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wbe may detect covid-19 before it is possible with random diagnostic testing, but the timing of virus shedding is uncertain.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variability in the timing of shedding sars-cov-2 into stool and persistence of shedding after symptoms resolve poses challenges for wbe.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Occupational exposure to contagious diseases from sampling sewage","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limitation of wbe to direct measures of viral infection such as pcr or antigen testing","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate sampling and sample preparation for sewage analysis","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Potential for significant forward transmission of contagious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of accurate information on the proportion of the total population that remains uninfected","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decreased willingness to comply with government recommendations for distancing and self-isolation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Asymptomatic infections persist, leading to undetected clusters of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of research and collaboration across scientific disciplines for the development of wbe as a public health tool.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient understanding of the correlation between wbe data and community-wide population demographics in relation to contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Uncertain signal calibration for covid-19 marker in wbe monitoring","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
